SELECT FILE_NO imgFile, BOARD_TYPE boardType, BOARD_NO boardNo, ORIGIN_NAME originName, CHANGE_NAME changeName, FILE_PATH imgFilePath, FILE_DATE imgFileDate
SELECT ANSWER_NO answerNo, ANSWER_TITLE answerTitle, ANSWER_CONTENT answerContent, ANSWER_DATE answerDate, MEM_ID memId, STATUS status, QNA_NO qnaNo
mapper.select: SELECT qnaNo, qnaTitle, qnaContent, qnaDate, memId, secret, qnaCategory, answerNo, answerTitle, answerContent, answerDate, answerMemId FROM ( SELECT QNA.QNA_NO qnaNo, QNA.QNA_TITLE qnaTitle, QNA.QNA_CONTENT qnaContent, QNA.QNA_DATE qnaDate, QNA.MEM_ID memId, QNA.SECRET secret, QNA.QNA_CATEGORY qnaCategory, ANSWER.ANSWER_NO answerNo, ANSWER.ANSWER_TITLE answerTitle, ANSWER.ANSWER_CONTENT answerContent, ANSWER.ANSWER_DATE answerDate, ANSWER.MEM_ID answerMemId, ANSWER.STATUS answerStatus, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM QNA LEFT JOIN ANSWER ON QNA.QNA_NO = ANSWER.QNA_NO WHERE QNA.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY QNA.QNA_NO DESC, ANSWER.ANSWER_DATE ASC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startValue} AND #{endValue}

SELECT DISTINCT Q.QNA_NO qnaNo, Q.QNA_TITLE qnaTitle, Q.QNA_CONTENT qnaContent, Q.QNA_DATE qnaDate, Q.MEM_ID memId, Q.SECRET secret, Q.QNA_CATEGORY qnaCategory FROM QNA Q JOIN PRODUCT P ON Q.MEM_ID = P.MEM_ID JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID JOIN ARTIST A ON M.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID WHERE A.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND Q.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY Q.QNA_DATE DESC

SELECT Q.QNA_NO qnaNo, Q.QNA_TITLE qnaTitle, Q.QNA_CONTENT qnaContent, Q.QNA_DATE qnaDate, Q.MEM_ID memId, Q.SECRET secret, Q.QNA_CATEGORY qnaCategory, A.ANSWER_NO answerNo, A.ANSWER_TITLE answerTitle, A.ANSWER_CONTENT answerContent, A.ANSWER_DATE answerDate, A.MEM_ID answerMemId FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON Q.QNA_NO = A.QNA_NO WHERE Q.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND Q.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY Q.QNA_DATE DESC

SELECT PQ.QNA_NO qnaNo, PQ.PRODUCT_NO productNo, PQ.QNA_TITLE qnaTitle, PQ.QNA_CONTENT qnaContent, PQ.QNA_DATE qnaDate, PQ.MEM_ID memId, PQ.STATUS status, PQ.QNA_CATEGORY qnaCategory, PA.ANSWER_NO answerNo, PA.ANSWER_TITLE answerTitle, PA.ANSWER_CONTENT answerContent, PA.ANSWER_DATE answerDate, PA.MEM_ID answerMemId, ( SELECT FILE_PATH FROM IMG_FILE WHERE BOARD_TYPE='상품문의' AND BOARD_NO=PQ.QNA_NO ) AS qnaFilePath, ( SELECT FILE_PATH FROM IMG_FILE WHERE BOARD_TYPE='답변' AND BOARD_NO=PA.ANSWER_NO ) AS answerFilePath FROM PRODUCT_QNA PQ LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_ANSWER PA ON PQ.QNA_NO = PA.QNA_NO WHERE PQ.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND PQ.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PQ.QNA_DATE DESC

SELECT PQ.QNA_NO qnaNo, PQ.PRODUCT_NO productNo, PQ.QNA_TITLE qnaTitle, PQ.QNA_CONTENT qnaContent, PQ.QNA_DATE qnaDate, PQ.MEM_ID memId, PQ.STATUS status, PQ.QNA_CATEGORY qnaCategory, PA.ANSWER_NO answerNo, PA.ANSWER_TITLE answerTitle, PA.ANSWER_CONTENT answerContent, PA.ANSWER_DATE answerDate, PA.MEM_ID answerMemId, ( SELECT FILE_PATH FROM IMG_FILE WHERE BOARD_TYPE='상품문의' AND BOARD_NO=PQ.QNA_NO ) AS qnaFilePath, ( SELECT FILE_PATH FROM IMG_FILE WHERE BOARD_TYPE='답변' AND BOARD_NO=PA.ANSWER_NO ) AS answerFilePath FROM PRODUCT_QNA PQ JOIN PRODUCT P ON PQ.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_ANSWER PA ON PQ.QNA_NO = PA.QNA_NO WHERE P.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND PQ.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PQ.QNA_DATE DESC
SELECT MEM_ID FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}

SELECT COUNT(QNA_NO) FROM QNA WHERE
MEM_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
QNA_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
QNA_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT Q.QNA_NO qnaNo, Q.QNA_TITLE qnaTitle, Q.QNA_CONTENT qnaContent, Q.QNA_DATE qnaDate, Q.MEM_ID memId, Q.SECRET secret, Q.QNA_CATEGORY qnaCategory, A.ANSWER_NO answerNo, A.ANSWER_TITLE answerTitle, A.ANSWER_CONTENT answerContent, A.ANSWER_DATE answerDate, A.MEM_ID answerMemId FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON Q.QNA_NO = A.QNA_NO WHERE
Q.MEM_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
Q.QNA_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
Q.QNA_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY Q.QNA_NO DESC

mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NO qnaNo, QNA_TITLE qnaTitle, QNA_CONTENT qnaContent, QNA_DATE qnaDate, MEM_ID memId, SECRET secret, QNA_CATEGORY qnaCategory FROM QNA WHERE QNA_NO = #{qnaNo}
